message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you is $1000000. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1150000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering its value to you is $1000000. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $1120000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're trying to save as much as possible, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1120000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $1130000.
